scripts.dev: PINBOARD_TOKEN=$(pass pinboard/token) WAKATIME_KEY=$(pass wakatime/api_key) npx tsc-watch --onSuccess "node build/app.js"
scripts.build.watch: PINBOARD_TOKEN=$(pass pinboard/token) WAKATIME_KEY=$(pass wakatime/api_key) npx tsc-watch
scripts.start.l: npm run build && PINBOARD_TOKEN=$(pass pinboard/token) WAKATIME_KEY=$(pass wakatime/api_key) node build/app.js
